Flow.description: Flow utilized by MSA/AMSA personas to automate the creation of Scheduling Cases and Progress Notes. - 1.18 (CCCM-30901) Case and PN when Unable to complete scheduling action for selected service; fix title final screen - 1.20 (CCCM-42391) Remove Vaccine Request choice
Flow.label: VCC Document Scheduling & Administrative Actions
